import React from "react"; import PropTypes from "prop-types"; import Link from "next/link"; import { Row, Col, Input, Menu } from "antd" const AppLayout = ({children}) => { return (
{/* a -> href 가 아닌 link -> href */} 노드버드 프로필 회원가입 {/* gutter -> 컬럼간의 간격 */} 왼쪽메뉴 {children} Jina Github
) } AppLayout.propTypes = { children : PropTypes.node.isRequired } export default AppLayout
